FLAVOUR_0_DESC.message: The Church of The Celestial Flying Spaghetti Monster needs YOUR money to spread the word of god.

FLAVOUR_0_MESSAGE.message: Tagh uiread gus a thoirt mar thìodhlac gu Eaglais an Uilebheist Sgiathaich Nèamhaidh Spaghetti.

FLAVOUR_1_DESC.message: The Guardians of the Free Spirit humbly request your charity to support our monasteries.

FLAVOUR_1_MESSAGE.message: Sìth gun robh ort, a charaid. Tagh uiread gus a thoirt mar thìodhlac gu Dìonadairean an Spioraid Shaoir.

FLAVOUR_2_DESC.message: War Orphan's Support needs your help to keep up its essential work.

FLAVOUR_2_MESSAGE.message: Tagh uiread an tìodhlaic a tha thu airson toirt do Chobhair Dìlleachdan Cogaidh is cuir crìoch air fulang na cloinne air feadh an reul-chriosa.

FLAVOUR_3_DESC.message: The Friends of the Galaxy 'Ban Military Drives' campaign needs your money.

FLAVOUR_3_MESSAGE.message: Tagh uiread gus a thoirt mar thìodhlac gun FhaireUaine is cuir crìoch air truailleadh ar reul-chriosa.

FLAVOUR_4_DESC.message: Save our species. Stop the carnage of newly settled worlds.

FLAVOUR_4_MESSAGE.message: Tagh uiread gus a thoirt mar thìodhlac.

FLAVOUR_5_DESC.message: Stop the great injustice of proprietary software controlling your ship.

FLAVOUR_5_MESSAGE.message: Saor do shoitheach! Tagh uiread gus a thoirt mar thìodhlac. Hackigeadh math dhut.

FLAVOUR_6_MESSAGE.message:
The {MILITARY}. You can always count on them.
Can they count on you?

FLAVOUR_7_MESSAGE.message: Those brave men and women of the {POLICE} who have dedicated their lives to keeping {SYSTEM} safe need your support!

FLAVOUR_8_DESC.message: Support the veterans of our armed forces.

FLAVOUR_8_MESSAGE.message: The brave soldiers of the {MILITARY} place themselves in harm's way for you!

FLAVOUR_9_DESC.message: Support the fight against poverty in the {FACTION}.

FLAVOUR_9_MESSAGE.message: We empower families in the {FACTION} to create a better future for all.

SALES_PITCH.message: Choisinneadh sibh deagh chliù le tìodhlac dhe {cash} dhan adhbhar againn ach chuidicheadh tìodhlac sam bith.

THANK_YOU_ALL_DONATIONS_ARE_WELCOME.message: Mòran taing. Cuiridh sinn fàilte air gach tìodhlac.

WOW_THAT_WAS_VERY_GENEROUS.message: Mo chreach! Nach tusa a tha fiùghanta!

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_MONEY.message: Chan eil airgead gu leòr agad.
